channel.title: 3rd on Computer Science - Robotics - Math - Computer Coding - Chess in Charlottesville
channel.description: Recent content in 3rd on Computer Science - Robotics - Math - Computer Coding - Chess in Charlottesville

item.title: 1-Day Camp; Apr 18, 2025 | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: Join us for an exhilarating exploration of robotics, coding, chess, and math. Teamwork and collaboration are at the heart of our camp experience. Students will have the opportunity to work together, share ideas, and solve challenges. Through hands-on activities and group projects, students will develop critical thinking skills and learn the importance of effective communication.

item.title: Banana Code Quest | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: Banana Code Quest is a gamified coding course designed to teach young students real-world coding from the first challenge. Through engaging puzzles and adventures, students help a monkey catch bananas and outsmart various animals while learning fundamental and advanced coding concepts in a fun and interactive way. Key Features Real Coding Language: Students will code using CoffeeScript, a language similar to JavaScript but with a friendlier syntax, making it perfect for kids.

item.title: Block Coding with Minecraft | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: This five-class sequence introduces the students to fundamental computer science concepts, including events and coordinates. Students will use a coding environment embedded in Minecraft Education to code their own commands, which they will then use in the game. Leveraging the engaging world of Minecraft Education, students will: Explore a custom coding environment integrated within the game Learn to write and execute their own commands Apply coding principles to manipulate the Minecraft world in real-time Develop problem-solving skills through interactive challenges Gain hands-on experience with spatial reasoning and algorithmic thinking By the end of the course, students will have a solid foundation in basic programming concepts, enhanced creativity, and improved logical reasoning skills—all while enjoying the familiar and exciting Minecraft platform.

First Lego League Explore | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: Dive into the world of Lego robotics Participate in the official First Lego League Explore program Work on collaborative projects with peers Learn about real-world applications of robotics and engineering This class is perfect for budding engineers and curious minds ready to take their first steps into the world of robotics!

Junior Robotics Adventures | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: Embark on an exciting year-long robotics adventure for young learners! This class combines two engaging programs to introduce basic robotics concepts through fun, themed challenges. Fall Semester: Jurassic Journey with Sphero indi Explore the prehistoric world using Sphero indi robots Learn basic coding concepts through hands-on activities Navigate dinosaur-themed mazes and challenges Develop problem-solving skills in a playful environment Spring Semester: First Lego League Explore Dive into the world of Lego robotics Participate in the official First Lego League Explore program Work on collaborative projects with peers Learn about real-world applications of robotics and engineering Throughout the year, students will: Gain hands-on experience with different robotic platforms Develop critical thinking and teamwork skills Boost creativity through themed challenges and projects Build a strong foundation for future STEM learning This class is perfect for budding engineers and curious minds ready to take their first steps into the world of robotics!

item.title: Junior Robotics Adventures on Saturday | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: Embark on an exciting year-long robotics adventure for young learners! This class combines two engaging programs to introduce basic robotics concepts through fun, themed challenges. Fall Semester: Jurassic Journey with Sphero indi Explore the prehistoric world using Sphero indi robots Learn basic coding concepts through hands-on activities Navigate dinosaur-themed mazes and challenges Develop problem-solving skills in a playful environment Spring Semester: First Lego League Explore Dive into the world of Lego robotics Participate in the official First Lego League Explore program Work on collaborative projects with peers Learn about real-world applications of robotics and engineering Throughout the year, students will: Gain hands-on experience with different robotic platforms Develop critical thinking and teamwork skills Boost creativity through themed challenges and projects Build a strong foundation for future STEM learning This class is perfect for budding engineers and curious minds ready to take their first steps into the world of robotics!

Math Boost | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: This class is tailored for students who are in the top half of the class, but need clarifications of some grade-level concepts. It offers reinforcement of key concepts through extra practice with typical grade-level problems, ensuring that students can grasp and master the material at their own pace. Additionally, students will have the opportunity to work on materials recommended by their classroom teacher and tackle problems suggested by Blue Ridge Boost instructors, providing a tailored and comprehensive approach to meet their individual learning needs.

item.title: Math Excellence | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: In our advanced math class, we harness the engaging and comprehensive materials from Beast Academy to cultivate a deep understanding and passion for mathematics. Each student embarks on a personalized mathematical journey under the guidance of an expert Blue Ridge Boost instructor. Class Structure Introduction: Each session begins with a concise lesson introducing new concepts and exercise types. Guided Practice: Students then apply these concepts through hands-on problem-solving, with instructor support readily available.

item.title: Math Leapers | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: The Math Kangaroo competition is an international mathematical competition where students from grades 1 through 12 participate. The curriculum for grades 3 and 4 focuses on enhancing mathematical skills through engaging and challenging problems, building on the foundational knowledge acquired in earlier grades. The Kangaroo Mathematics Competition, set for Thursday, March 20, 2025. The class will continue for the duration of the school year to prepare students for the next year’s competition.

item.title: Math Mastery | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: This advanced mathematics class is designed for curious students ranking in the top of their class who are eager to explore math beyond the typical school curriculum. Utilizing the renowned Dimensions Singapore Math curriculum, our year-long program emphasizes deep conceptual understanding, critical thinking, problem-solving strategies, and practical application of mathematical principles. Key Features: Advanced Mental Math Strategies: Students will be introduced to various mental math techniques to improve their calculation skills.

item.title: Math Olympiad Contest | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: MATH OLYMPIAD 2024-2025 Unleash Your Mathematical Genius! 🏆 Calling All Young Math Stars (Grades 3-6) Challenge your mind and discover the excitement of problem-solving at this year's Math Olympiad! Join hundreds of bright young mathematicians for an unforgettable experience. Why Participate? • Boost your critical thinking skills • Meet other math enthusiasts • Gain competition experience The unique problem sets must be administered each month from November through March. You can participate in any or all contests.

item.title: Minecraft Education for Beginners | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: 🎮 Start Your Minecraft Adventure! 🎮 Join our beginner-friendly class and dive into the world of Minecraft! What You'll Learn: 🏗️ Building Basics: Master the essentials of crafting and construction. 🌿 Survival Skills: Learn how to gather resources and thrive in survival mode. 🗺️ Exploration Tips: Discover exciting biomes and hidden treasures. 👥 Multiplayer Fun: Connect with others and enjoy cooperative gameplay. Free pizza included!

item.title: Minecraft Education for Elementary School | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: 🎮 Start Your Minecraft Adventure! 🎮 Join our beginner-friendly class and dive into the world of Minecraft! What You'll Learn: 🏗️ Building Basics: Master the essentials of crafting and construction. 🌿 Survival Skills: Learn how to gather resources and thrive in survival mode. 🗺️ Exploration Tips: Discover exciting biomes and hidden treasures. 👥 Multiplayer Fun: Connect with others and enjoy cooperative gameplay. Free pizza included!

TechQuest | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: Fall: The VEX GO CompetitionThe VEX GO Competition (VGOC) is an introductory robotics program designed for elementary school students, typically ages 5-11. It uses the VEX GO building system, which features large, colorful, and easy-to-handle components. Teams of students work together to design, build, and program simple robots to complete challenges on a small playing field. The competition emphasizes hands-on learning, problem-solving, and teamwork while introducing young learners to basic engineering and coding concepts in a fun, engaging environment.
